allow: Bash(del COMPETITIVE_ANALYSIS_REPORT.md EXECUTIVE_SUMMARY.md IMPLEMENTATION_ROADMAP.md QUICK_ACTION_GUIDE.md README.md)
Bash(cmd /c "cd C:\opt\stardew\dev && del COMPETITIVE_ANALYSIS_REPORT.md EXECUTIVE_SUMMARY.md IMPLEMENTATION_ROADMAP.md QUICK_ACTION_GUIDE.md README.md")

Bash(cmd /c "cd C:\opt\stardew\doc && del multiplayer_opportunities.md multiplayer_code_examples.md multiplayer_quick_reference.md strategic_enhancement_opportunities.md strategic_enhancements.md enhancement_summary.md economic_case_study.md code_review_inefficiencies.md critical_issues_with_fixes.md code_review_index.md review_summary.md ux_opportunities.md ux_opportunities_summary.md example_configs.md architecture_comparison.md cross_platform_analysis.md cross_platform_value_proposition.md cross_platform_quick_reference.md CROSS_PLATFORM_EXECUTIVE_SUMMARY.md")
Bash(cmd /c "if not exist C:\opt\stardew\dev mkdir C:\opt\stardew\dev")
Bash(cmd /c "if not exist C:\opt\stardew\dashboard mkdir C:\opt\stardew\dashboard")
Bash(cmd /c "move dashboard_generator.py dashboard\ && move README_DASHBOARD.md dashboard\README.md")
Bash(cmd /c "copy dashboard_generator.py dashboard\ & copy README_DASHBOARD.md dashboard\README.md")
Bash(cmd /c "del dashboard_generator.py README_DASHBOARD.md dashboard.html dashboard_state.json 2>nul & echo Cleanup complete")
Bash(cmd /c "type %USERPROFILE%\.claude\settings.json 2>nul || echo File does not exist")
